title: Did Paden order the suspension of Keystone XL Piblin "Destroy" 11,000 jobs?
subtitle: The exact number of posts abolished as a result of an executive order to stop construction of the pipeline remains unknown.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In January 2020, US President Joe Biden ordered an executive order to stop the construction of the Keystone XL "Destroy" 11,000 jobs.
